body:
The Form Builder roadmap shows the things weâ€™re working on and what we plan to offer. This might change depending on testing, research and feedback from users.

Form Builder is in alpha. This means we're:

* building a prototype of our tool 
* testing our prototype with users
* training and offering support to users who've started to use Form Builder
* iterating based on user testing and feedback    

### October to December 2018

* Provide an easy workflow process for users to create, edit and publish digital forms
* Improve the user experience for the editor and publisher    

### January to March 2019

* Test Form Builder with 3 digital teams
* Add new features to support more forms (save and return, configurable output, file attachment, user authentication)   

### April 2019 onwards

* Roll Form Builder out to more digital teams at MOJ

### Queries and suggestions

You can [contact us](form-builder-team@digital.justice.gov.uk) for more detail about these features, or to suggest something you'd like Form Builder to offer. You can also ask us a question over our [Slack channel](https://mojdt.slack.com/messages/CE26QEL1Z/).
heading: Roadmap
